notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.Y. and M.V. designed the project and prepared the manuscript. C.Y. processed and analyzed most of the data. J.D and H.R pre-processed the satellite data and part of the weather station data. D.H. installed and maintained the high-elevation automated weather station on QIC summit and quality-controlled and pre-processed the AWS data. O.E.T. pre-processed the CMIP5 model data. A.R. led the SLA error analysis. All authors contributed to editing and correcting the manuscript.
